metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy

startIpAddressCheck.description: The beginning of the IP address range. Example: 62.241.24.20

endIpAddressCheck.description: The end of the IP address range. Example: 62.241.24.29

FirewallRule1_startIpAddress.description: The beginning of the IP address range for FirewallRule1. Example: 62.241.24.20

FirewallRule1_endIpAddress.description: The beginning of the IP address range for FirewallRule1. Example: 62.241.24.20

FirewallRule1_firewallRuleName.description: The name of the firewall rule to create for FirewallRule1

FirewallRule2_startIpAddress.description: The beginning of the IP address range for FireWallRule2. Example: 62.241.24.41

FirewallRule2_endIpAddress.description: The beginning of the IP address range for FireWallRule2. Example: 62.241.24.41

FirewallRule2_firewallRuleName.description: The name of the firewall rule to create for FireWallRule2
